title: Malaya posting
brief_description: Australian overseas army personnel in Malaya. The contrasts of old and new in this multi-racial Asian country; surrender barracks and the facilities for servicemen’s families; training in jungle warfare, tropical first aid; transport in the jungle; sports and places to visit in leisure time. Australia’s servicemen as ambassadors.
